list.name: Time region for panel VMI Creation Time
Time region for panel VMI Start Rate
Time region for panel VMI Count (approx.)

panels.description: How many read requests (LIST,GET,WATCH) per second do the apiservers get by code?
panels.title: API Server - Read Requests Rate

panels.description: How many seconds is the 99th percentile for reading (LIST|WATCH|GET) a given resource?

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.90, sum(rate(apiserver_request_duration_seconds_bucket{group="kubevirt.io", instance=~"$instance", verb=~"LIST|GET", scope="cluster"}[5m])) by (le, resource, verb))

panels.title: API Server - Read Requests Duration

panels.description: How many write requests (POST|PUT|PATCH|DELETE) per second do the apiservers get by code?

targets.expr: sum(irate(rest_client_requests_total{instance=~"$instance", pod=~"virt-controller.*|virt-handler.*|virt-operator.*|virt-api.*|vm.*|hco.*|kubevirt.*", container!="", method=~"POST|PUT|PATCH|DELETE"}[2m])) by (code, group, container, job, verb, method) > 0

panels.title: API Server - Write Requests Rate

panels.description: How many seconds is the 99th percentile for writing (POST|PUT|PATCH|DELETE) a given resource?

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.90, sum(rate(apiserver_request_duration_seconds_bucket{group="kubevirt.io", instance=~"$instance", verb=~"POST|PUT|PATCH|DELETE"}[5m])) by (le, verb, resource)) > 0

panels.title: API Server - Write Requests Duration

targets.expr: sum(irate(rest_client_requests_total{instance=~"$instance", pod=~"virt-controller.*|virt-handler.*|virt-operator.*|virt-api.*|vm.*|hco.*|kubevirt.*", container!="", method=~"GET|LIST"}[2m])) by (code, container, job, verb, method) > 0
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(rest_client_request_latency_seconds_bucket{instance=~"$instance", verb=~"GET|LIST", container!=""}[2m])) by (le, verb, container)) > 0

panels.description: How many write requests (POST|PUT|PATCH|DELETE) per second do the apiservers get by code?

targets.expr: sum(irate(rest_client_requests_total{instance=~"$instance", pod=~"virt-controller.*|virt-handler.*|virt-operator.*|virt-api.*|vm.*|hco.*|kubevirt.*", container!="", method=~"POST|PUT|PATCH|DELETE"}[2m])) by (code, container, job, verb, method) > 0

panels.title: API Client - Write Requests Rate

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(rest_client_request_latency_seconds_bucket{instance=~"$instance", verb=~"POST|PUT|PATCH|DELETE", container!=""}[2m])) by (le, verb, container)) > 0

panels.description: How many seconds has the longest running processor for workqueue been running.
panels.title: Work Queue - Longest Running Processor

targets.expr: sum(irate(rest_client_requests_total{instance=~"$instance", pod!~"virt-controller.*|virt-handler.*|virt-operator.*|virt-api.*|vm.*|hco.*|kubevirt.*", container!="", method=~"GET|LIST"}[2m])) by (code, container, job, verb, method) > 0

panels.description: How many seconds is the 99th percentile for writing (GET|LIST") a given resource?

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.90, sum(rate(apiserver_request_duration_seconds_bucket{group!="kubevirt.io", instance=~"$instance", verb=~"GET|LIST"}[5m])) by (le, verb, resource)) > 0

panels.title: API Server - Read Requests Duration

targets.expr: sum(irate(rest_client_requests_total{instance=~"$instance", pod!~"virt-controller.*|virt-handler.*|virt-operator.*|virt-api.*|vm.*|hco.*|kubevirt.*", container!="", method=~"POST|PUT|PATCH|DELETE"}[2m])) by (code, container, job, verb, method) > 0

panels.description: How many seconds is the 99th percentile for writing (POST|PUT|PATCH|DELETE) a given resource?

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.90, sum(rate(apiserver_request_duration_seconds_bucket{group!="kubevirt.io", instance=~"$instance", verb=~"POST|PUT|PATCH|DELETE"}[5m])) by (le, verb, resource)) > 0

panels.title: API Server - Write Requests Duration

targets.expr:
sum(rate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{namespace=~".*kubevirt.*|openshift-cnv", instance=~"$instance"}[5m])) by (node, pod) +
sum(rate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{namespace=~".*kubevirt.*|openshift-cnv", instance=~"$instance"}[5m])) by (node, pod)
